sentence: In Georgia, for instance, the incumbent Governor Brian Kemp, who drew Trump's enmity when he called the state for Biden, has built a sizeable war chest and is running neck and neck or slightly ahead of Trump's choice, former Sen. David Perdue.
author: Elaine Kamarck
title: Is Trump's hold on the Republican Party getting weaker?

title: Trump's endorsement power will be put to the test as May primaries approach
